code: import React,{useState}from'react';import SubNav from'../../components/common/layout/SubNav';import MarketingDashboard from'./components/MarketingDashboard';import ContentSchedule from'./components/content/ContentSchedule';import EventsCalendar from'./components/events/EventsCalendar';import BrandGuidelines from'./components/brand/BrandGuidelines';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Marketing=()=>{const[activeSubTab,setActiveSubTab]=useState('dashboard');const subTabs=[{id:'dashboard',name:'Dashboard'},{id:'content',name:'Content Schedule'},{id:'events',name:'Events Calendar'},{id:'brand',name:'Brand Guidelines'}];const renderContent=()=>{switch(activeSubTab){case'dashboard':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MarketingDashboard,{});case'content':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContentSchedule,{});case'events':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EventsCalendar,{});case'brand':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrandGuidelines,{});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MarketingDashboard,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Marketing"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SubNav,{subTabs:subTabs,activeSubTab:activeSubTab,onSubTabChange:setActiveSubTab}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-8",children:renderContent()})]});};export default Marketing;
